about_the_game:
Rust and Resolve is a 2D platforming game, developed with the intent to cause harm to desktop surfaces, monitors and other miscellaneous computer hardware.
Play as a small robot tasked with navigating the tricky environment in an attempt to find a way home.

Features:


- Lots of platforming
- Progressively difficult environmental challenges
- Simple yet challenging control scheme
- Character interactions and story development
- Speedrun friendly features such as inbuilt timers and personal leaderboards


Developer Comment:

"This is my first and only (as of release) Indie game."

"My intent with this project is to develop a greater understanding of video game production and development. I look forward to seeing how the community interacts with this game and, of course, hope that you have a great time playing."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (sixth generation or newer) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Embark on a quest to navigate the tricky and unforgiving environment in an attempt to return home.
